== CAPTCHA ==
== CAPTCHA ==
[[Image:RapidShare cat CAPTCHA.png|thumb|right|200px|An example of an old RapidShare CAPTCHA]]
[[Image:RapidShare cat CAPTCHA.png|thumb|right|200px|An example of an old RapidShare CAPTCHA]]
  +
[[Image:RapidShare CAPTCHA.png|thumb|right|200px|An example of the new CAPTCHAs used]]
RapidShare [[CAPTCHA]]s used to be up to 7 warped alphanumeric characters, each with a dog or a cat printed over them. The user was instructed to type in the 4 letters (although technically some "letters" are actually numbers) with the cat on them.
RapidShare [[CAPTCHA]]s used to be up to 7 warped alphanumeric characters, each with a dog or a cat printed over them. The user was instructed to type in the 4 letters (although technically some "letters" are actually numbers) with the cat on them.
